title: Blogfodder: oh, there will be cats a-plenty
author: VD
content_html:
This is how feminist bloggers are defeating the Patriarchy:

i got me tattoo.

yuppers. it’s purty..

Rose is biting me, now.

Vox day is a fucking retard. Dumb ass evil retard.

i have a cat on my shoulder, for really literally.

I can’t help but envision a feline-filled future for this scion of the Sisterhood. And based on this writing sample, I suspect that my buttocks may in fact be more intelligent than this future cat-collector.
